main.selector_title: First and last part of the analyzed text:

tooltips.append_clipboard: Append clipboard at the end of current text (new line)
tooltips.snapshot_save: Save current text to a snapshot

results_help.tip1: Precise mode uses Unicode segmentation to count characters (graphemes) and words using Intl.Segmenter.
results_help.tip2: When manually entering a time into the stopwatch, the invisible fractions of a second are eliminated.
results_help.tip3: To select all the text in an area, use Ctrl + A (Windows and Linux) or Command(‚åò) + A (Mac).
results_help.tip4: You can select text by first selecting the text at one end and then, while holding down the Shift key, clicking on the other end.
results_help.tip5: A standard book usually contains between 250 and 300 words per page (this only applies to languages that use the Latin alphabet, or close derivatives, and have a similar grammatical structure).
results_help.tip6: 'You have invented an elixir not of memory, but of reminding' (Plato)
results_help.tip7: 'Writing requires a double abstraction: abstraction from the sound of speech and abstraction from the interlocutor.' (Vygotsky)

alerts.task_open_error: Could not open the task editor.
alerts.task_invalid_rows: There are invalid rows in the task.
alerts.task_path_outside: The file must be inside the tasks folder.
alerts.library_save_error: Could not save to the library.
alerts.library_delete_error: Could not delete from the library.

confirm.discard_changes: There are unsaved changes. Discard them?
confirm.close_unsaved: There are unsaved changes. Close without saving?

modal_preset.name: Name:
modal_preset.hint: Custom presets are stored in user settings.

alerts.clipboard_too_large: Clipboard text is too large to process. Reduce it and try again.
alerts.append_too_large: Resulting text is too large to process. Reduce it and try again.
alerts.clipboard_overflow: Clipboard text exceeds the maximum allowed and was truncated.
alerts.append_overflow: Append text exceeds the maximum allowed and was truncated.
alerts.text_limit: Cannot add text: maximum size reached.
alerts.clipboard_error: An error occurred while pasting from clipboard. Check console.
alerts.append_error: An error occurred while appending text. Check console.
alerts.clear_error: An error occurred while clearing text. Check console.
alerts.snapshot_outside: The snapshot must be inside the snapshots folder.
alerts.snapshot_truncated: Snapshot exceeds the maximum size and was truncated.
alerts.preset_not_found: Selected preset not found in cache.
alerts.edit_error: An error occurred while editing the preset. Check console.
alerts.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the preset. Check console.
alerts.restore_error: An error occurred while restoring presets. Check console.
alerts.open_presets_unsupported: Cannot open presets folder in this environment.
alerts.open_presets_error: An error occurred while trying to open the presets folder. Check console.
alerts.open_presets_fail: Could not open the default presets folder. Check console for details.

alerts.wip_cargador_imagen: WIP: In a future version, it will be possible to import text from image files here.

alerts.wip_shortcuts: WIP: The keyboard shortcuts selector will open here in a future version.
alerts.wip_avisos: WIP: Announcements and news will appear here in a future version.
alerts.wip_discord: WIP: The Discord link will open here in a future version.

editor_alerts.paste_too_big: Text too large to paste directly. Use the main window buttons.
editor_alerts.drop_too_big: Dropped text is too large. Use the main window buttons to add large text.
editor_alerts.paste_no_text: Clipboard does not contain plain text.
editor_alerts.drop_no_text: Drag and drop: no plain text detected.
editor_alerts.type_limit: Cannot type more text: maximum size reached.
editor_alerts.paste_limit: Cannot paste more text: maximum size reached.
editor_alerts.paste_truncated: Pasted text was truncated to avoid exceeding the maximum.
editor_alerts.drop_truncated: Dragged text exceeded the available space and was truncated.
editor_alerts.text_truncated: Text was truncated to fit the application limit.
editor_alerts.calc_error: An error occurred while calculating. Check console.

preset_alerts.wpm_invalid: WPM must be a number between 50 and 500.
preset_alerts.create_error: An error occurred while creating the preset. Check console.
preset_alerts.edit_error: An error occurred while editing the preset. Check console.
preset_alerts.process_error: An error occurred while processing the preset. Check console.
